segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s spreading across the floor, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and the puddle is getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s just standing there drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to slip if they step in that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely full, and the water just keeps running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the drain must be clogged or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron is going to get wet any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
